reviewText: Early Access Review\n\nIt's pretty for a couch party game. Since it's in early access at the time of writing, there are obviously some bugs. The game feels completely build around you using a controller, but keyboard bindings are easy enough to change. Over all though it's pretty fun.
voteText: 2 of 2 people (100%) found this review helpful

Early Access Review

I love this game and find it highly competitive so if your looking for a Battle Network" esq game then this is a great ting to play with your friends. But i hav not tryed playing 4v4 yet but i think the utter chaos would be amazing.This game is good and the developers love it and are passionate about it. It  is worth the price."
